Name: Black Space
About the game: An arena space shooter has just arrived to you! This small game is a 2D singleplayer space shooter. But instead of an RPG or top-down scrolling game this time it is an arena style game. It is meant for quick time wasting, so you can quickly launch a game, play a bit and then do something else. Black Space is free, without any costs. Default keys : wasd: Move forward/backward & strafe left/right left/right arrow: Turn ship space: Fire your weapon 1-0: Select weapon shift: Use speed boost tab: Show scores esc: Pause game and show menu ^: Toggle console Have much fun and a relaxing time with this game! Credits for menu theme: Manuel Senfft ( www.tagirijus.de)
Meta Title: Black Space: Jun 20, 2021, Daniel Brendel and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Black Space? Check out the release date (Jun 20, 2021), developer insights from Daniel Brendel, and a complete game summary.
